# 1898 Swarthmore Quakers football team

The 1898 Swarthmore Quakers football team was an American football team that represented Swarthmore College as an independent during the 1898 college football season. The team compiled a 9â€“2 record and outscored opponents by a total of 152 to 64. Jacob K. Shell was the head coach.
